title: New Beach Road, Darling Point
content:
Our client a young professional living in Darling Point came to Inhaus Living wanting to update their old bathroom and kitchen. They were after a fresh, modern look that would suit their busy lifestyle – something stylish, easy to maintain and practical for day to day living.

The goal was to create two spaces that looked great but also worked well for their everyday needs.

With the client’s vision in mind, our team crafted a dual renovation strategy that married clean aesthetics with practical design choices.

Soft Neutral Tones: These were selected to create a soothing atmosphere, keeping the palette timeless and fresh. A gorgeous textured tiled feature wall behind the shower works well with the rest of the space creating cohesion.

Minimalist Design Principles: Clean lines, open space, and clutter-free surfaces, ensuring the bathroom felt open and serene.

Premium Fixtures and Fittings: These were chosen for both quality and style, providing long-lasting elegance and performance without high maintenance demands.

Sleek All-White Palette: The perfect selection to create a sense of space and brightness, with a gorgeous marble grey grained backsplash and waterfall island benchtop.

Integrated Appliances: The best appliances were integrated into the design of the kitchen for a sleek modern look.

Smart Design/Layout: The design and layout of the kitchen was well thought out for a functional.

The result of the bathroom and kitchen renovation was stunning. The flow and cohesion of both spaces, really opens the space and make the apartment lighter and airier, functional and more spacious.

Make an enquiry today with Inhaus Living.
